entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
